name: 李旻璁
objective:
This course introduces the fundamentals of computer programming. Students will learn the basic components of computer language and the algorithms for coding. The goal is to help students feel confident in mapping scientific problems into computational frameworks, designing mathematical algorithms, and writing and debugging programs for specific tasks. 

Language: Fortran 95/2003/2008/2018 & Python 3.0
Software: Gnuplot, vim, VMD
schedule:
(01) Coding, program, and calculations
(02) Linux, bash commands, vim editor, compiler
(03) Algorithm and program structure
(05) Input and output, declaration, format
(06) Math operators and functions
(07) Do loop
(08) Logical control
(09) Array
(10) File
(11) Subroutine and module
(12) Numerical methods
(12) Numerical methods
(13) Numerical methods
(13-18) Course project and Python
scorePolicy:
# Class participation (50%, based on Rubrics)
# Final exam (50%, closed book)
remarks: If needed, we will switch to Google Meet for online courses.
